## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run `make lint` and addressed all issues

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`make test`)
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error conditions

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md file (added to Unreleased section)
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments for exported functions

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated go.mod and go.sum if I added dependencies
- [ ] New dependencies are necessary and justified
